column4: use thunderbird, if IMAP is activated for exchange server than you will be able to receive and send emails else you will be able just to read you mail as you may try webmail owa addon
imap, pop, and smtp are not enabled, as far as i can tell
try the autosearch feature (for possible communication ports) when creating new account with thunderbird 3.0 or above
just create a new account and try ;)
